systems.name: Tank System
systems.description: Core system governing tank classes, attributes, and gameplay mechanics.

systems.mechanics: Passive skills enhance tank performance based on conditions; active skills provide tactical advantages.

logic_rules.description: Increases attack power when nearby teammates are defeated.
logic_rules.effect: Attack power increases by 5% per teammate (max 30%).

logic_rules.summary: Like A Bat Out Of Hell Passive
logic_rules.description: Boosts movement speed near heavy tanks.
Increases attack power for each enemy tank destroyed.
logic_rules.effect: Attack power increases by 7% per tank (max 30%).

logic_rules.description: Grants permanent attack bonus for every four enemy tanks destroyed.
logic_rules.effect: Permanent +5% attack power for the match.

logic_rules.trigger: Proximity to enemy tanks within 7 units.

logic_rules.description: Creates a smoke screen when health is low.
logic_rules.effect: Creates a 5-unit radius smoke screen granting team invisibility for 5 seconds.

requirements.title: Diverse Playstyles
requirements.description: Ensure tank classes offer distinct strategic options.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Three tank classes with unique roles and attributes implemented.

requirements.title: Balance Across Modes
requirements.description: Ensure tanks are balanced across different game modes.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Tanks perform consistently in PvP and PvE modes.

requirements.title: Skill Implementation
requirements.description: Implement active and passive skills for tanks.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Skills enhance gameplay without unbalancing classes.
